alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bennington and northwestern Windham Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manchester, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Stratton, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Sunderland, Pikes Falls, Stratton Valley, Bondville, Kelley Stand, West Jamaica, Stratton Acres, Rawsonville, Intervale, Manchester Depot, Richville, Barnumville, Strattonwald, Stratton Mountain, Piper Ridge and Sunderland Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
